episode.translation[0].definitions[0].de: an event or a short period of time during which something happens
episode.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: She decided she would try to forget the episode by the lake.
one of the most interesting episodes in his career
episode.translation[0].definitions[1].de: a television or radio programme that is one of a series of programmes in which the same story is continued each week
episode.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: the first episode of a new drama series
